div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: The Laurel SD will use this page to provide communication and updates on how the district will respond to the COVID-19 pandemic. We will continue to closely monitor this fluid situation and provide additional details as they become available.
Governor Wolf has ordered the closing of all Pennsylvania Schools starting Monday March 16th. The Laurel SD facilities will not be open to any activity or event during this time.

p.a: Laurel SD Virtual Board Meeting Update - March 30, 2020
